overview: Departing Cabo San Lucas onboard a beautiful 68’ Hatteras with special permits to fish the Revillagigedo Islands we had some of the best big yellowfin tuna and wahoo fishing we’d ever seen.  The shots of the fish blowing up on the kite baits are amazing and to see wahoo flying over 30 feet in the air to attack the baits is flat out amazing.  Packed with action, tips and information, few people have ever had the opportunity to fish Socorro Island from a private yacht.
title: Wahoo to Ground Control
